title: TMGW #170: Mamrie’s Sauna Misadventure
description:
This Week Grace and Mamrie discuss Pottery, the fear of eating popcorn alone, JLo’s marketing plan, and they have strong feelings about jelly beans.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/tmgw16 and use code tmgw16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

Go to http://purple.com/tmgw10 and use promo code TMGW10 for 10% off any order of $200 or more.

Go to http://stitchfix.com/tmgw to try Stitch Fix!
